foreignData.name: Versklaven
foreignData.text:
Verzaubert eine Kreatur
Du kontrollierst die verzauberte Kreatur.
Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments fügt die verzauberte Kreatur ihrem Besitzer 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

foreignData.name: Esclavizar
foreignData.text:
Encantar criatura.
Tú controlas la criatura encantada.
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, la criatura encantada hace 1 punto de daño a su propietario.

foreignData.name: Esclavage
foreignData.text:
Enchanter : créature
Vous contrôlez la créature enchantée.
Au début de votre entretien, la créature enchantée inflige 1 blessure à son propriétaire.

foreignData.name: Schiavizzare
foreignData.text:
Incanta creatura
Controlli la creatura incantata.
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, la creatura incantata infligge 1 danno al suo proprietario.

foreignData.name: 隷属
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー）
あなたはエンチャントしているクリーチャーをコントロールする。
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、エンチャントされているクリーチャーはオーナーに１点のダメージを与える。
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignData.name: Escravizar
foreignData.text:
Encantar criatura
Você controla a criatura encantada.
No início de sua manutenção, a criatura encantada causa 1 ponto de dano ao seu dono.

foreignData.name: Порабощение
foreignData.text:
Зачаровать существо
Вы контролируете зачарованное существо.
В начале вашего шага поддержки зачарованное существо наносит 1 повреждение своему владельцу.

foreignData.name: 奴役
foreignData.text:
结附于生物
你操控所结附的生物。
在你的维持开始时，所结附的生物对其拥有者造成1点伤害。

foreignData.name: 奴役
foreignData.text:
結附於生物
你操控所結附的生物。
在你的維持開始時，所結附的生物對其擁有者造成1點傷害。

name: Enslave
originalText:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
At the beginning of your upkeep, enchanted creature deals 1 damage to its owner.

rulings.text: Gaining control of a permanent doesn’t cause you to gain control of any Auras or Equipment attached to it. They’ll remain attached, but their abilities that refer to “you” still refer to its controller rather than you. The controller of such an Equipment can activate its equip ability to move it back to one of their creatures during their main phase.

The owner of a card is the player who started the game with that card in their deck. If the card didn’t start the game in a deck, its owner is the player who brought the card into the game, via Living Wish or a similar effect.
A token’s owner is the player who created it.

text:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
At the beginning of your upkeep, enchanted creature deals 1 damage to its owner.
